vote.text: Amendment SA 2201 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2201 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator DeWine to Amendment SA 1783. (consideration: CR S15022; text: CR S15022) To make certain monetary modifications.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2201 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator DeWine to Amendment SA 1783.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2201 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
